title: Development Officer I - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Development Officer I Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Oversight of all aspects of our Athletic Club Annual Fund. Manage all aspects of the Fund (football ticket priority) and Gymnastics Endowment Fund annual drives. Assist major gifts team...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
